info.name: Artneidich API Collection
info.description: Full API collection for Artneidich backend. Includes all endpoints, variables for base URL and authentication, and example responses.

request.description:
Register a new user.

Validation fields:
- firstName: string, required, min 1 character
- lastName: string, required, min 1 character
- email: string, required, valid email
- password: string, required, min 6 characters
- role: 1 (admin) or 2 (inspector), required

item.name: Login

request.description:
Authenticate a user and receive a JWT token.

Validation fields:
- email: string, required, valid email
- password: string, required, min 6 characters

response.name: 403 Forbidden (Not Approved)

item.description: Authenticate a user and receive a JWT token.

request.description:
Request a password reset link.

Validation fields:
- email: string, required, valid email
- webRequest: boolean, optional
- mobileRequest: boolean, optional
- Either webRequest or mobileRequest must be provided, but not both.

response.name: 200 OK

item.name: Reset Password

request.description:
Reset user password using a token or OTP.

Validation fields (OTP mode):
- email: string, required, valid email
- otp: string, required, exactly 6 characters
- newPassword: string, required, min 6 characters

Validation fields (Token mode):
- email: string, required, valid email
- token: string, required, valid UUID
- newPassword: string, required, min 6 characters

item.description: Reset user password using a token.

item.name: Change Password

request.description:
Change the password for the authenticated user.

Validation fields:
- currentPassword: string, required, min 6 characters
- newPassword: string, required, min 6 characters

item.description: Change the password for the authenticated user.

response.name: 400 Bad Request
403 Forbidden

request.description:
Update the authenticated user's profile.

Validation fields (all optional):
- firstName: string, min 1 character
- lastName: string, min 1 character
- email: string, valid email

response.name: 400 Bad Request

query.description: Filter by suspension status (true or false)
Filter by approval status (true or false)

item.name: Get User By ID
item.description: Get a user by ID (admin/root only).

body.raw:
{
  "inspector": "60d21b4667d0d8992e610c85",
  "formType": "RCI Residential Building Code Inspection",
  "feeStatus": "Standard",
  "agreedFee": 1000,
  "fhaCaseDetailsNo": "FHA123456",
  "orderId": "ORD123",
  "streetAddress": "123 Main St",
  "developmentName": "Greenfield",
  "siteContactName": "Jane Smith",
  "siteContactPhone": "+1234567890",
  "siteContactEmail": "contact@example.com",
  "dueDate": "2026-01-10T00:00:00.000Z",
  "specialNotesForInspector": "Please check the roof.",
  "specialNoteForApOrAr": "Urgent job."
}

request.description:
Create a new job (admin/root only).

Validation fields:
- inspector: string (MongoId), required
- formType: enum, required ("RCI Residential Building Code Inspection", "UnKnown")
- feeStatus: enum, required ("Standard", "Rush Order", "Occupied Fee", "Modified Fee", "Long Distance Fee")
- agreedFee: integer, required, nonnegative
- fhaCaseDetailsNo: string, required
- orderId: string, required
- streetAddress: string, required
- developmentName: string, required
- siteContactName: string, required
- siteContactPhone: string, required
- siteContactEmail: string, optional, valid email
- dueDate: date, required, cannot be in the past
- specialNotesForInspector: string, optional, max 1250 chars
- specialNoteForApOrAr: string, optional, max 1250 chars

query.description: Job status filter. Allowed values: all, in_progress, submitted, completed, rejected. Default: all.

response.name: 200 OK
response.body:
{
  "success": true,
  "message": "Jobs fetched successfully",
  "data": [
    {
      "_id": "jobid1",
      "inspector": "60d21b4667d0d8992e610c85",
      "formType": "RCI Residential Building Code Inspection",
      "feeStatus": "Standard",
      "agreedFee": 1000,
      "fhaCaseDetailsNo": "FHA123456",
      "orderId": "ORD123",
      "streetAddress": "123 Main St",
      "developmentName": "Greenfield",
      "siteContactName": "Jane Smith",
      "siteContactPhone": "+1234567890",
      "siteContactEmail": "contact@example.com",
      "dueDate": "2026-01-10T00:00:00.000Z",
      "specialNotesForInspector": "Please check the roof.",
      "specialNoteForApOrAr": "Urgent job.",
      "createdAt": "2026-01-01T12:00:00.000Z",
      "updatedAt": "2026-01-06T12:00:00.000Z"
    }
  ],
  "metaData": {
    "page": 1,
    "limit": 10,
    "total": 1
  },
  "code": 200
}

request.description:
Update a job (admin/root only).

Validation fields (all optional):
- inspector: string (MongoId)
- formType: enum ("RCI Residential Building Code Inspection", "UnKnown")
- feeStatus: enum ("Standard", "Rush Order", "Occupied Fee", "Modified Fee", "Long Distance Fee")
- agreedFee: integer, nonnegative
- fhaCaseDetailsNo: string
- orderId: string
- streetAddress: string
- developmentName: string
- siteContactName: string
- siteContactPhone: string
- siteContactEmail: string, valid email
- dueDate: date, cannot be in the past
- specialNotesForInspector: string, max 1250 chars
- specialNoteForApOrAr: string, max 1250 chars

response.name: 400 Bad Request

request.description:
Create a new report (inspector only).

Validation fields:
- job: string (MongoId), required
- images: array of objects, required, 1-2 images
  - imageLabel: string (MongoId), required
  - fileName: string, required
  - alt: string, optional
  - mimeType: string, required
  - size: integer, required, nonnegative
  - noteForAdmin: string, optional
  - buffer: any, optional
  - stream: any, optional
- You must provide 1 or 2 images.

query.description: Report status filter. Allowed values: all, in_progress, submitted, completed, rejected. Default: all.
